titles.ar: بَابُ أَنَّ مَثَلَ سِلَاحِ رَسُولِ اللَّهِ ( صلى الله عليه وآله ) مَثَلُ التَّابُوتِ فِي بَنِي إِسْرَائِيلَ
titles.en: Chapter 39 – An example of the weapons of Rasool-Allah<sup>saww</sup> is an example of the Ark among the Children of Israel

titles.ar: باب فِيهِ ذِكْرُ الصَّحِيفَةِ وَ الْجَفْرِ وَ الْجَامِعَةِ وَ مُصْحَفِ فَاطِمَةَ ( عليها السلام )
titles.en: Chapter 40 – In it is the mention of the Parchment, and the Jaf’r, and the Jami’e, and Parchments of Fatima<sup>asws</sup>

titles.ar: بَابُ مَا عِنْدَ الْأَئِمَّةِ مِنْ سِلَاحِ رَسُولِ اللَّهِ ( صلى الله عليه وآله ) وَ مَتَاعِهِ
titles.en: Chapter 38 – What is with the Imams<sup>asws</sup> from the weapons of Rasool-Allah<sup>saww</sup> and his<sup>saww</sup> chattels

titles.ar: بَابُ أَنَّ مَثَلَ سِلَاحِ رَسُولِ اللَّهِ ( صلى الله عليه وآله ) مَثَلُ التَّابُوتِ فِي بَنِي إِسْرَائِيلَ
titles.en: Chapter 39 – An example of the weapons of Rasool-Allah<sup>saww</sup> is an example of the Ark among the Children of Israel

gradings: Allamah Baqir al-Majlisi: مجهول - Mir‘at al ‘Uqul Fi Sharh Akhbar Al al Rasul (53/ 3)

narrator_chain.text: عِدَّةٌ مِنْ أَصْحَابِنَا عَنْ أَحْمَدَ بْنِ مُحَمَّدٍ عَنْ عَلِيِّ بْنِ الْحَكَمِ عَنْ مُعَاوِيَةَ بْنِ وَهْبٍ عَنْ سَعِيدٍ السَّمَّانِ قَالَ

text: سَمِعْتُ أَبَا عَبْدِ اللَّهِ ( صلوات الله عليه ) يَقُولُ إِنَّمَا مَثَلُ السِّلَاحِ فِينَا مَثَلُ التَّابُوتِ فِي بَنِي إِسْرَائِيلَ كَانَتْ بَنُو إِسْرَائِيلَ أَيُّ أَهْلِ بَيْتٍ وُجِدَ التَّابُوتُ عَلَى بَابِهِمْ أُوتُوا النُّبُوَّةَ فَمَنْ صَارَ إِلَيْهِ السِّلَاحُ مِنَّا أُوتِيَ الْإِمَامَةَ .

en.hubeali: A number of our companions, from Ahmad Bin Muhammad, from Ali Bin Al Hakam, from Muawiya Bin Wahab, from Saeed Al Samman who said,

‘I heard Abu Abdullah<sup>asws</sup> saying: ‘But rather, and example of the weapons among us<sup>asws</sup> is an example of the Ark among the Children of Israel. The Children of Israel were such that whichever family the Ark was found to be upon their door, were Given the Prophet-hood. So the one<sup>asws</sup> from us<sup>asws</sup> to whom the weapons come to be, is Given the Imamate’.
en.sarwar: 1. A number of our people has narrated from Ahmad ibn Muhammad from Ali ibn al-Hakam from Mu’awiya ibn Wahab from Sa‘id al-Samman who has said that he heard abu ‘Abdallah (a.s.) say the following. “The case of the Armaments with us is like the case of the Ark with Israelites. In whichever house of the Israelites the Ark would hav 3ebeen found that house would receive prophet-hood. Whoever among us would receive the Armaments he would also receive Imamat (leadership with Divine authority).”

gradings: Allamah Baqir al-Majlisi: موثق - Mir‘at al ‘Uqul Fi Sharh Akhbar Al al Rasul (3/53)

narrator_chain.text: عَلِيُّ بْنُ إِبْرَاهِيمَ عَنْ أَبِيهِ عَنِ ابْنِ أَبِي عُمَيْرٍ عَنْ مُحَمَّدِ بْنِ السُّكَيْنِ عَنْ نُوحِ بْنِ دَرَّاجٍ عَنْ عَبْدِ اللَّهِ بْنِ أَبِي يَعْفُورٍ قَالَ

text: سَمِعْتُ أَبَا عَبْدِ اللَّهِ ( عليه السلام ) يَقُولُ إِنَّمَا مَثَلُ السِّلَاحِ فِينَا مَثَلُ التَّابُوتِ فِي بَنِي إِسْرَائِيلَ حَيْثُمَا دَارَ التَّابُوتُ دَارَ الْمُلْكُ فَأَيْنَمَا دَارَ السِّلَاحُ فِينَا دَارَ الْعِلْمُ .

en.hubeali: Ali Bin Ibrahim, from his father, from Ibn Abu Umeyr, from Muhammad Bin Al Sukeyn, from Noah Bin Darraj, from Abdullah Bin Abu Yafour who said,

‘I heard Abu Abdullah<sup>asws</sup> saying: ‘But rather an example of the weapons among us<sup>asws</sup> is an example of the Ark among the Children of Israel. Wherever the Ark went to, the Kingdom went. So wherever the weapons go to among us<sup>asws</sup>, the Knowledge would come along with it’.
en.sarwar: 2. Ali ibn Ibrahim has narrated from his father from ibn abu ‘Umayr from Muhammad ibn al-Sukayn from Nuh ibn Darraj from ‘Abdallah ibn abu Ya‘fur who has said that he heard abu ‘Abdallah (a.s.) say the following. “The case of the Armaments with us is like the case of the Ark with the Israelites. Wherever the Ark would go kingdom would also follow. Wherever the Armaments go among us knowledge (leadership with Divine authority) also follows it.”

gradings: Allamah Baqir al-Majlisi: صحيح - Mir‘at al ‘Uqul Fi Sharh Akhbar Al al Rasul (53/ 3)

narrator_chain.text: مُحَمَّدُ بْنُ يَحْيَى عَنْ مُحَمَّدِ بْنِ الْحُسَيْنِ عَنْ صَفْوَانَ عَنْ أَبِي الْحَسَنِ الرِّضَا ( عليه السلام ) قَالَ

text: كَانَ أَبُو جَعْفَرٍ ( عليه السلام ) يَقُولُ إِنَّمَا مَثَلُ السِّلَاحِ فِينَا مَثَلُ التَّابُوتِ فِي بَنِي إِسْرَائِيلَ حَيْثُمَا دَارَ التَّابُوتُ أُوتُوا النُّبُوَّةَ وَ حَيْثُمَا دَارَ السِّلَاحُ فِينَا فَثَمَّ الْأَمْرُ قُلْتُ فَيَكُونُ السِّلَاحُ مُزَائِلًا لِلْعِلْمِ قَالَ لَا .

en.hubeali: Muhammad Bin Yahya, from Muhammad Bin Al Husayn, from Safwan,

(It has been narrated) from Abu Al-Hassan Al-Reza<sup>asws</sup> having said: ‘Abu Ja’far<sup>asws</sup> was saying: ‘But rather an example of the weapons among us<sup>asws</sup> is an example of the Ark among the Children of Israel. Wherever the Ark went, the Prophet-hood was Given, and wherever the weapons go to among us<sup>asws</sup>, so does the Divine Authority’. I said, ‘So do the weapons happen to be counterparts of the Knowledge?’ He<sup>asws</sup> said: ‘No’.
en.sarwar: 3. Muhammad ibn Yahya has narrated from Muhammad ibn al-Husayn from Safwan from abu a1-Hassan al-Rida (a.s.) who has said the following. “Abu Ja‘far (a.s.) would say, ‘The case of the Armaments with us is as the Ark with the Israelites. Wherever the Ark would go prophet-hood would also follow. Wherever the Armaments among us would go the matter (leadership with Divine authority) would also settle there.” I then asked, “Would the Armaments ever depart knowledge?” The Imam (a.s.) said, “No, it would not do so.”

gradings: Allamah Baqir al-Majlisi: صحيح - Mir‘at al ‘Uqul Fi Sharh Akhbar Al al Rasul (3/54)

narrator_chain.text: عِدَّةٌ مِنْ أَصْحَابِنَا عَنْ أَحْمَدَ بْنِ مُحَمَّدٍ عَنِ ابْنِ أَبِي نَصْرٍ عَنْ أَبِي الْحَسَنِ الرِّضَا ( عليه السلام ) قَالَ

text: قَالَ أَبُو جَعْفَرٍ ( عليه السلام ) إِنَّمَا مَثَلُ السِّلَاحِ فِينَا كَمَثَلِ التَّابُوتِ فِي بَنِي إِسْرَائِيلَ أَيْنَمَا دَارَ التَّابُوتُ دَارَ الْمُلْكُ وَ أَيْنَمَا دَارَ السِّلَاحُ فِينَا دَارَ الْعِلْمُ.

en.hubeali: A number of our companions, from Ahmad Bin Muhammad, from Ibn Abu Nasr,

(It has been narrated) from Abu Al-Hassan Al-Reza<sup>asws</sup> having said: ‘Abu Ja’far<sup>asws</sup> said: ‘But rather an example of the weapons among us<sup>asws</sup> is like an example of the Ark among the Children of Israel. Wherever the Ark went, so did the Kingdom, and wherever the weapons go to among us<sup>asws</sup>, so does the Knowledge’.
en.sarwar: 4. A number of our people has narrated from Ahmad ibn Muhammad from ibn abu Nasr from abu al-Hassan al-Rida (a.s.) who has said the following. “Abu Ja‘far (a.s.) would say, ‘The case of the Armaments with us is as the Ark with the Israelites. Wherever the Ark would go kingdom would also follow. Wherever the Armaments among us would go knowledge would also follow.”
